short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate parts of making a Facebook campaign with Facebook Marketing API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly configure campaigns and ad sets with Facebook Marketing API. This is where you some save time! The UI will only show up on the screen if you are on the adsmanager.facebook.com page.
